title: AFRICA - Baka Forest People - Heart Of The Forest
description:

in 1992 by Martin cradick of Baka Beyond deep 
in the Cameroonian rainforest. Martin Cradick 
left guitars with the Baka group he stayed with 
and after 10 years these same Baka Pygmies formed
